greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of distinct decimal digits appearing in n.
comment: a(n) <= 45 = 1+2+3+4+5+6+7+8+9; A227378(n) = smallest number m such that a(m) = n, 0 <= n <= 45. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 09 2013
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Index entries for Colombian or self numbers and related sequences
program: (PARI) { a(n) = local( d = vecsort( eval(Vec(Str(n))),,8) ); sum(i=1,#d,d[i]) }
a217928 = sum . nub . map (read . return) . show :: Integer -> Integer
results.author: _Max Alekseyev_, Oct 15 2012
